name: PushBlock
setup: Agent on a platform with a movable block and a goal region.
goal: Push the block so that it touches or enters the goal region.

agents.description: Single agent that can move and rotate while pushing the block.

terms: +1.0 when the block is successfully pushed to the goal.

behavior_parameters.vector_observation_space: Ray-based observation around the agent encoding walls, goal, and block.
behavior_parameters.actions: 1 discrete branch with 7 actions (rotate left/right, move in four directions, or do nothing).

float_properties.name: block_scale
float_properties.description: Size of the block in the horizontal plane.

float_properties.name: block_drag
float_properties.description: Linear drag applied to the block.
